ygData.subject: RE: From Casters Realm...
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I ve seen, the dev teams idea of extensive testing is to look at the code and say oh yeah, that should work .  They can t even tell when a quest is
ygData.messageBody:
From what I've seen, the dev teams idea of extensive testing is to look at
the code and say "oh yeah, that should work". They can't even tell when a
quest is broken from day one they implement it so they obviously don't even
unit test their code by running it once.

Kitasi
Quality Analyst in RL for an Investment firm
"Believe me I know tested when I see it and EQ ain't it"

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 8:03 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] From Casters Realm...


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

BARDIC PLANE ARMOR
I just double checked with the dev team to try and resolve this and have
been informed they have extensively tested this and the Bard armor is
dropping on public servers.

Guess it's just ultra rare. At least Maestro always has a prsent for them.


Submitted by Baelish, 8:29 PM
